name: Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Smolsky v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of June, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
69 A.3d 235
Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
